SELECT HOUSEID as houseId,BUILDID as buildId,SITFLOORNUM as floorNum,SITUNITNUM as unitNum,SITDOORNUM as roomNum,HOUSEUSAGE1CODE as "usage",DIAGRAMSTATECODE as stateCode,CREATETIME as createTime,HOUSEPROP as houseProp,LAYOUT as layout,HOUSETYPE as houseType, ARCHITSTRUCTCODE as architStructcode,ARCHITAREA as architArea,ROOMAREA as roomArea,APPORTAREA as apportArea,BARGAINTOTALPRICE as bargainTotalprice,SITNUMGATHER as sitnumGather,OTHERPROP as otherprop,house_Code as houseCode FROM TBBWDIAGRAMHOUSE WHERE BUILDID = #{buildId}

update TBBWDIAGRAMHOUSE SET SITDOORNUM = #{roomNum}, ARCHITSTRUCTCODE = #{architStructcode}, HOUSEUSAGE1CODE = #{usage}, HOUSETYPE = #{houseType}, HOUSEPROP = #{houseProp}, LAYOUT = #{layout}, OTHERPROP = #{otherprop}, ARCHITAREA = #{architArea}, ROOMAREA = #{roomArea}, APPORTAREA = #{apportArea}, BARGAINTOTALPRICE = #{bargainTotalprice} where HOUSEID = #{houseId}
